rules.surveyText:
ASK IF S6=1

Family Origin

S6a. Which of the following best describes your family’s country or region of origin? _Select all that apply._
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask S6a to respondents who answered Yes to S6 (Are you of Hispanic or Latino origin?).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have answered S6 = 1 (Yes, Hispanic/Latino).

rules.surveyText:
S10b. You said your reason for having a drink **[INSERT LOCATION 1]** in the past week was best described as **[INSERT S10a WITH LOWERCASE “a” AT THE BEGGINNING OF THE ANSWER CHOICE]**. More specifically, what best describes that moment? _Select one._

PN: SHOW RESPONSES BASED ON S10a SELECTION. DO NOT SHOW HEADERS. RANDOMIZE KEEPING SUBCATEGORIES WITHIN A HEADING TOGETHER
rules.plainTextRule: Within S10b, show only the subset of response options that correspond to the choice the respondent made at S10a (i.e., S10b's answer list is filtered by the S10a selection).
rules.conditionDescription: Which specific S10b response options are shown depends on the respondent's selection at S10a (S10b presents only the sub-items mapped to the S10a category chosen).

rules.surveyText:
S11b. You said your reason for having a drink **[INSERT LOCATION 2]** in the past week was primarily described as **[INSERT S11a WITH LOWERCASE “a” AT BEGINNING OF ANSWER CHOICE]**. More specifically, how would you describe that moment? _Select one._

PN: SHOW RESPONSES BASED ON S11a SELECTION (SAME LIST PROVIDED AT S10B). DO NOT SHOW HEADERS. RANDOMIZE KEEPING SUBCATEGORIES WITHIN A HEADING TOGETHER
rules.plainTextRule: Within S11b, show only the subset of response options that correspond to the choice the respondent made at S11a (i.e., S11b is filtered by S11a selection).
rules.conditionDescription: Which specific S11b response options are shown depends on the respondent's selection at S11a.

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF A4=7,8,9,10, 11, 12, OR 13

Form of drink 1 and 2

A5. When you had the **[INSERT A4]**, which of the following reflects the form of the drink?
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A5 to respondents who selected one of the specified A4 values (A4 = 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, or 13).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have selected A4 in {7,8,9,10,11,12,13}.

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF LOCATION 1/LOCATION 2 IS ON-PREMISE

When decided on drink 1 and 2

A6. Which of the following reflect why you drank **[INSERT A4]**?
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A6 for the occasion when the location is on-premise (i.e., the current loop instance corresponds to an on-premise location).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must be answering about a location coded as ON-PREMISE (derived from S9 selection for that loop).

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF A9 DOES NOT EQUAL 1

Number of people 1 and 2

A10. Including yourself, how many people were with you when you had this drink? _Enter a whole number_.

PN: VALID ANSWERS ARE 2 THRU 30
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A10 if the respondent did not indicate they were alone at A9 (A9 != 1).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have A9 not equal to 1 (i.e., they were with others).

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF A4=4,5,7,8,9,10, 11, 12, OR 13

Brand Occasion 1 and 2

A13. What brand of **[INSERT A4]** did you have? _Select one_.
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A13 (brand) for respondents whose A4 selection is in the specified set (types of drinks for which brand is relevant).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have selected A4 in {4,5,7,8,9,10,11,12,13}.

rules.surveyText:
ASK A13b IF A13a=1

A13b. What other drinks did you have in addition to **[INSERT A4]**? Select all that apply.
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A13b when the respondent indicated they had one or more additional drinks at that location (A13a = 1).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have answered A13a = 1 (Yes, had additional drinks).

rules.surveyText:
ASK A14a-A19 IF LOCATION 1/LOCATION 2 IS OFF-PREMISE

A14a. When you recently had a drink **[LOCATION 1/LOCATION 2]**, which of the following best describes your role in the original purchase of **[INSERT A4]** for it? _Select one._
rules.plainTextRule: The block A14a through A19 is only asked for loop instances where the location is OFF-PREMISE. (These are purchase-related questions relevant only when the drink was consumed off-premise.)
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must be answering about a location coded as OFF-PREMISE (derived from S9 selection for that loop).

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF A14a=1

Location of Purchase 1 and 2

A14b. Given you purchased the **[INSERT A4]** for the drink you recently had **[LOCATION 1/LOCATION 2]**, where did you originally make the purchase?
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A14b when the respondent indicated they purchased the drink themselves (A14a = 1).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have answered A14a = 1 (I went to the store/made the purchase myself).

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF A4=7 WAS CHOSEN FOR LOCATION 1/LOCATION 2 AND A14a=1

Vodka Size 1 and 2

A15. What size was the bottle of vodka you purchased at **[INSERT A14b ANSWER WITHOUT PARENTHESES]**? _Select one_
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A15 when the drink type (A4) was Vodka (A4 = 7) and the respondent indicated they purchased the drink themselves (A14a = 1).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have A4 = 7 (Vodka) and A14a = 1 (self-purchased).

rules.surveyText:
A14a=1

Purchase Intent 1 and 2

A16. Which of the following best describes describe why you decided to purchase **[INSERT A4]**? Select one/all that apply.

... (A17, A18, A19 are similarly prefaced with A14a=1)
rules.plainTextRule: A16 through A19 are only asked when the respondent indicated they purchased the drink themselves (A14a = 1).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have answered A14a = 1 (I went to the store/made the purchase myself).

rules.surveyText:
ASK IF ANY BRAND SELECTED IN A21

A22. Which of the following brands do you associate with the following attribute: **[INSERT ATTRIBUTE FROM ATTRIBUTE BRAND LIST IN APPENDIX IN BOLD/BLUE]**? Select all that apply.

PN: ASK A22 ONCE FOR EACH ATTRIBUTE—RANDOMIZE ATTRIBUTE ORDER; SHOW BRANDS SELECTED IN A21
rules.plainTextRule: Only ask A22 to respondents who selected at least one brand in A21. Within A22, show only the brands the respondent selected in A21 (A22 presents only those brands).
rules.conditionDescription: Respondent must have selected one or more brands in A21; A22's shown brand options are limited to the subset selected at A21.

rules.surveyText: PN: ASK A22 ONCE FOR EACH ATTRIBUTE—RANDOMIZE ATTRIBUTE ORDER; SHOW BRANDS SELECTED IN A21
rules.plainTextRule: Row-level: For A22, show only the brand rows that the respondent selected earlier at A21 (each attribute question shows only the brands the respondent indicated awareness of).
rules.conditionDescription: Which brand rows appear in each A22 attribute question depends on which brands the respondent selected at A21.

rules.surveyText: A23. How likely are you to consider the following brands the next time you have a drink? PN: SHOW BRANDS SELECTED IN A21—RANDOMIZE BRAND LIST
rules.plainTextRule: Show A23 only for brands the respondent selected in A21 (A23 items are limited to the brands the respondent previously indicated awareness of).
rules.conditionDescription: Each brand row in A23 is shown only if that brand was selected in A21.
